name: Lake Geneva
description: Traveling promotes happiness and helps you take your mind off stressful situations. This leads to lower cortisol levels, making you feel more calm and content.

name: Rome's Capitoline Museums.
description: Located on the summit of the Capitol Hill near the Roman Forum in the centre of Rome, the Capitoline Museums are the oldest public museums in the world.

name: Sentosa Island
description: The food, the prices, the incredible hotels, cheap hostels, beautiful islands, the ease of getting around- any and all could be responsible for why Thailand is so popular.

name: Eiffel Tower
description: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France. It is named after the engineer Gustave Eiffel, whose company designed and built the tower

name: Mount Fuzi
description: A must-see on Sentosa Island is the Merlion, Singapore's famous statue that has the head of a lion and the body of a fish. You can take an escalator to the top of the statue and enjoy panoramic views of the surrounding area.

name: Yellowstone National Park
description: Yellowstone National Park is a nearly 3,500-sq.-mile wilderness recreation area atop a volcanic hot spot. Mostly in Wyoming, the park spreads into parts of Montana and Idaho too.
